mdRecord.dcterms:title: The perfect horse: how to know him, how to breed him, how to train him, how to shoe him, how to drive him / By William H.H. Murray, with an introduction by Rev. Henry Ward Beecher, and a treatise on agriculture and the horse, by Hon. George B. Loring. Containing illustrations of the best trotting stock-horses in the United States, done from life, with their pedigrees, records, and full descriptions
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Loring, George B. (George Bailey), 1817-1891
Murray, W. H. H. (William Henry Harrison), 1840-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: xi, [2] p., 1 l., 480 p. front., plates, tables. 24 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Horses
